definition: harmonious arrangement or relation of parts or elements within a whole, as in a design, adjust in size relative to other things
details:
noun
- harmonious arrangement or relation of parts or elements within a whole, as in a design
= example: harmonious arrangement or relation of parts or elements within a whole, as in a design
= synonyms: balance
- magnitude or extent
= example: magnitude or extent
= synonyms: dimension
- the relation between things (or parts of things) with respect to their comparative quantity, magnitude, or degree
= example: the relation between things (or parts of things) with respect to their comparative quantity, magnitude, or degree
= synonyms: ratio
- the quotient obtained when the magnitude of a part is divided by the magnitude of the whole
- balance among the parts of something
= synonyms: symmetry
verb
- adjust in size relative to other things
- give pleasant proportions to
